patthana21.45:1.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana21.45:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana21.45:1.1_2: paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nakenaci
patthana21.45:1.1_3: viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana21.45:1.1_4: ca kenaci naviññeyyo sanidassanasappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana21.45:2.1: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.45:3.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva. (Sabbattha nava.)
patthana21.45:4.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighassa purimasadisaṁ navapañhaṁ kātabbaṁ. Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighamūlassa nava pañhāyeva.
patthana21.45:5.1: Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
